meanings.definition: The quality or state of being excessive or extravagant.
meanings.sent1: The exorbitance of her spending habits left her in debt.
meanings.sent2: The exorbitance of the decorations at the party was breathtaking.
meanings.sent3: The exorbitance of his ice cream sundae toppings made everyone at the table laugh.
meanings.sent4: The exorbitance of the storm's fury shook the entire town.
meanings.sent5: The exorbitance of the fireworks display lit up the night sky.

meanings.definition: An instance of excessive or extravagant behavior.
meanings.sent1: The exorbitance of his demand for a golden toilet was shocking.
meanings.sent2: Her exorbitance in buying designer clothes was well-known among her friends.
meanings.sent3: The exorbitance of his dance moves at the party drew everyone's attention.
meanings.sent4: The exorbitance of the lion's roar echoed through the jungle.
meanings.sent5: The exorbitance of the chef's signature dish delighted all the diners.
